body:
Hey guys,
So, I just joined Avicus a day ago. This was the first server I joined, right after getting my Minecraft account. I love to play Nebula, and I just got my first monument today. Say hi to me in game!

replies.body:
Hey! :D 
Every new player's welcomed here! :) 

Like everyone else said, if you have any questions or concerns, feel free to ask an experienced member or a Staff Member like me! 

Really hope you enjoy your stay buddy!

replies.body:
Since it's already been brought up, I will confirm that SubSeven_ is an alt.

But let's ignore that and ask questions.

What is your favorite animal?
What is your favorite fruit?
Favorite season?
What sport do you play, if any?
Favorite game other than Minecraft?

replies.body:
Hey, I hope you enjoy your time here! :D
Lots of friendly people willing to help you out.. this is probably the best server size to niceness wise. A lot of other large servers like this have quite bad communities :c
Anyways, have fun!
